thread.title: Madonna brings spectacle — and new affection — to Detroit
thread.title_full: Madonna brings spectacle — and new affection — to Detroit

title: Madonna brings spectacle — and new affection — to Detroit
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Madonna brings spectacle — and new affection — to Detroit Madonna made her hometown "Rebel Heart" stop Thursday at Joe Louis Arena, serving up ageless energy and enthusiasm about Detroit's comeback. Post to Facebook Madonna brings spectacle — and new affection — to Detroit Madonna made her hometown "Rebel Heart" stop Thursday at Joe Louis Arena, serving up ageless energy and enthusiasm about Detroit's comeback.
